![](https://www.middletownnj.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=6993)

There are more than dozen boards, commissions and committees in Middletown Township. Board members are volunteers and are appointed by the Middletown Township Committee. Appointments are made annually at the Township’s Organization Day Meeting in January. Terms on the boards and commissions vary from one to five year terms.
Please contact the Township Clerk's Office by calling 732-615-2015 if you need assistance.

1. Township Committee
   1. [Mayor Tony Perry](https://www.middletownnj.org/407/Mayor-Tony-Perry)
   2. [Deputy Mayor Rick W. Hibell](https://www.middletownnj.org/500/Deputy-Mayor-Rick-W-Hibell)
   3. [Committeeman Ryan M. Clarke](https://www.middletownnj.org/662/Committeeman-Ryan-M-Clarke)
   4. [Committeewoman Kimberly Kratz](https://www.middletownnj.org/718/Committeewoman-Kimberly-Kratz)
   5. [Committeeman Kevin M Settembrino](https://www.middletownnj.org/410/Committeeman-Kevin-M-Settembrino)
